title: At Whit's End: A Christmas Village Novella
description: Whitney Saunders enters her new life in Seattle in the second year of marriage, the first week of a new job, and no position to make Christmas perfect for her husband. Soon, cards, presents, lights, and baking take over her life. Can she bring together a wonderful holiday, or will her efforts pull apart the happy home she wants so much?
author: Terry Deighton
